MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles. It has necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:33PM due to safety concern at Cottage Bank and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and safely as possible by 8pm. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:35PM on 20 February 2021.
